abstract: In the Haut Marais in Paris, a store that is part canteen and part boutique.
snippet: In the Haut Marais in Paris, a store that is part canteen and part boutique.
lead_paragraph: When Astan Konaté, a Frenchwoman with a background in marketing and brand development, met the Cypriot designer Erotokritos Antoniadis, they bonded over their desire "to mix fashion and food." Together they opened First Floor - part canteen and part boutique - in the Haut Marais in Paris.
